channel.title: I have a couple of Questions
channel.description:
I have a couple of questions.
1) When I plant bones it gives me way too much exp. How can i reduce the exp given to me?
2) On my client I cannot check the coordinates of my location by clicking tools/wrench. Is there any other way of doing that?
So far that's all.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 18, 2009, 03:42:35 pm[/size][hr].

item.title: I have a couple of Questions
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

Don’t double post. This is gonna get locked.
